message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe $8000 would be a fair price for it.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $8000 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $8000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your initial offer of $8000, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $11000. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope you can meet me halfway.
